name: Sven: Completely Screwed
summary: Play the passionate, immoral ram Sven and try to bring every sheep from the flock to their climax - but don’t get caught by shepherd Lars and his trusty dog Wotan in the process! Spunkier and hotter than ever before!

name: Svoboda 1945: Liberation
summary:
The horrors of World War II are over, but peace never came to the Czech village of Svoboda. You were sent to investigate a decades-old feud. Who can you trust to explain what happened? How was your family involved? Talk to witnesses to uncover the troubled past.

Svoboda 1945: Liberation is a unique blend of adventure gameplay, full-motion video interviews with real actors and historically-accurate interactive memories of people who lived through the chaos of the aftermath of World War 2. Discover the secret history of your own family in a captivating story about reconciliation with the dark past.

name: Svekmas: The Game
summary:
Svekmas: The Game

Get ready for a hilarious holiday adventure in Svekmas: The Game! This lighthearted and satirical game was created as a tribute to Svekmas, the annual Christmas event hosted by DikkeSvekke.

Take control of Santa’s sleigh and his trusty reindeer in a fast-paced, fun-filled challenge. With simple controls (spacebar or right mouse click), navigate your way through an endless winter wonderland. Dodge Christmas trees, stay alive as long as possible, and climb the community leaderboard to prove you’re the ultimate sleigh master!

Will you survive the chaotic festivities and reign supreme this Svekmas season?

name: Svrvive: The Deus Helix
summary:
Svrvive: The Deus Helix is a mystery game in which you are abducted from your earthly life to join an alien agent workforce. You must unearth clues to save the universe, as well as yourself.

It’s up to you to explore the great variety of galaxies and dimensions in the Svrvive universe. Throughout your quest, remember to interact with all parts of your environment – you can never be sure what mysterious object or beautiful scenery may contain the clue you’ve been searching for.

name: Svarog's Dream
summary: Awaken as a soul from the Underworld. Discover who you are and explore an ever-changing open world full of mystery. Fight the beasts and gods or ally with them. Die and be reborn in this unforgettable adventure.

name: Sven's Quest: House of the Woodland Witch
summary: Your little brother, Mats, has gone missing. Could it be that he's a victim of the witch living in the woods outside town? Solve the mystery by talking to the locals and exploring the area.

name: Sven Co-op
summary: Sven Co-op is a co-operative game originally based around Valve Software's Half-Life. In this game players must work together against computer controlled enemies and solve puzzles as a team.

name: Svaland
summary:
Svaland is a funny action RPG game inspired by classics of the genre.
It can be played single (game can be played without connection) and also can be multiplayer (LAN: sharing connection for now).
It's easy to control and there's no pay-to-win as you can obtain every object in the game different ways. Even best items can be obtained totally free.

You can choose up to 12 spells from 104 divided by fire, water, air, earth, frost, lightning, nature, poison, blood, light, darkness and necromancy. There's also basic skills. Some of them are passive, other are survival or damaging.
Play one of the next classes: Fighter, Tracker, Worker or Mystic.
Choose your weapons as they determine your basic attacks: swords, axes, hammers, daggers, staves, spears, shields, two-handed weapons, and dual weild, bows, crossbows, guns...

Fight orcs, dwarves, elves, kobolds, bandtis, goblins, gnolls, dragons, skeletons, zombies, and many more... Or ally with them. There are many possibilities.
You decide your adventure with your travels across forests, swamps and deserts. To the Capital, or the other side to Nokmar. Maybe to the east desert where air magic is used, or down to the south of dwarves and their metalwork. Reveal the secrets of the elves! There are lot of treasures full of gold, equipment and spells.

Use a complete SET to get bonus stats. Combine your skills, weapons and talents to success in your battles and combats.
You don't need to level up, but a good equipment, talents and spell selection (even not being mystic, there are passive skills, and blood spells don't requitre mana but health).

Enjoy the experience in an extense world populated by creatures with their own point of view and conflicts. Help them to solve or provoke clash. Thanks to KARMA system you can align your character to unlock LIGHT and NECROMANCY skills.

name: Sven - Gut zu Vogeln
summary: This is the sixth game in the seven-title Sven Bømwøllen series.

name: Sverigespelet
summary: The band Tripple & Touch is without a drummer and it is up to you to find them one somewhere in Sweden. Use Flight, Train, Bus, or Boat. In order to buy the ticket, you must either win it or earn it (by answering questions, with three answer options). At the beginning of the game, you receive a mission, and through it, you might figure out in which city the Drummer is located. But there are also clues that you can win or earn. There are plenty of video clips with the Tripplets, and you'll see them as encouragement when things go well - or not so well... You can have up to five real players taking turns, or if you're playing alone, up to five opponents who are in the game. This game was released to promote and train for the Swedish edition of "Who Wants to be a Millionaire?"

name: Sven Bømwøllen
summary: In Sven Bømwøllen, the player controls Sven, a black sheep, with a task to mate with all the white sheep around.

name: Svetlograd
summary: Evil imps are invading the cities of Svetlograd. As a counter-measure, a crossbow is deployed to protect the gates, using the imps themselves as ammunition.

name: Svajp
summary:
Svajp is a puzzle game where you draw your own blocks with your smart phone.

The block will fall down and hopefully fit with the board. When a full row is filled that row will be destroyed. When all the blocks are destroyed the level is cleared. The game needs you to focus and think of how each block should be drawn to fit the board.

Story mode The player will complete faster and harder levels, and if done fast enough a star will be rewarded.
Endless An endless game which gets faster and harder and there will be a highscore at the end of the run.

For now it's only a Android game but there might be a iPhone version if there is enough interest. I also have a lot of ideas to add if the game gets popular.

name: Sven-Göran Eriksson's World Challenge
summary: Sven-Göran Eriksson's World Challenge is a soccer game. It features 204 national teams from all over the world. There are six playing modes: Exhibition match, training, league, play-offs, World Cup qualification or World Cup championship. It uses the same handling as the Kick Off series, which means the ball doesn't stick to the players' feet.

name: Sven's SudokuPad
summary: Sven's SudokuPad finally lets you play your own Sudoku puzzles in the same app as used by Cracking the Cryptic in their videos. Created by Sven, the same developer who has created and improved the Cracking the Cryptic Sudoku webapp over the past year.

name: Svea Rike
summary: Svea Rike is a 1997 turn-based strategy video game based on the history of Sweden. The title roughly translates to "Swedish Realm".

name: Sverigejakten
summary: Sverigejakten is a Swedish educational game where the player needs to catch the bad guy by travelling around Sweden as detectives.

name: Svoboda
summary: Svoboda is a novel in real time. And in mother-Russia, by the way.

name: Sverdheim
summary: A roguelike game in a procedural world with generative music.

name: Svarog's Dream: Return of the Old Gods
summary: Bringing more action, expanding on the story, and everything else you liked in the core game.

name: SVG-001 Puzzle
summary: Classic jigsaw puzzle with beautiful visuals, waiting for you to piece it together.

name: Svea Rike 2
summary: Svea Rike II is the sequel to Svea Rike and was followed up by Europa Universalis: Crown of the North.
